titleStmt.title: A changling no company for lovers of loyaltie, or The subjects lesson in poynt of sacred submission to, and humble complyance with God and the King; wherein confusion is reduced to order, misery to mercy; reproach and shame to freedom and honour.
titleStmt.author: W. H.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by M. Simmons, for Thomas Parkhurst, and are to be sold at the three Crowns, at the lower end of Cheapside,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
